title: Working on DDR2 and attending a conference in Tampa Florida
author: Tariq (Ethernet Support)
content:
Now we need to push real HMDI traffic through Packetizer and Ethernet. I am reading up and learning about DDR2 in my time that i have from attending ISVLSI conference in Tampa, Florida.

This will be continue on the weekend and next week until get done. Since i am traveling back home, you may not see Friday's blog.

Please tolerate that :)
Originally posted on GSOC 2014
